31#include "gmp.h"
32#include "gmp-impl.h"
33
34mp_ptr
35mpz_limbs_modify (mpz_ptr x, mp_size_t n)
36{
37 ASSERT (n > 0);
38 return MPZ_REALLOC (x, n);
39}
